title: Table Ware, "Colorstone, Matte Black", 1986
markings: On underside, overglaze print in white reads: "SASAKI COLORSTONE MATTE BLACK BY VIGNELLI DESIGNS INC. (c) 1986 MADE IN JAPAN"
provenance: Lella and Massimo Vignelli; 1990: acquired by Museum
creditline: Gift of Lella and Massimo Vignelli
description: Dinner plate (-1), salad plate (-2), bowl (-3), cup and saucer (-4a,b). Plates, bowl, saucer, and cup with loop handle, of circular form in a matte black glaze; rims unglazed, exposing cream-colored stoneware body in contrast to glaze.

tombstone.epitaph: Table Ware, "Colorstone, Matte Black", 1986. Molded and glazed stoneware. Gift of Lella and Massimo Vignelli. 1990-2-1/4.
